Text: Possibly a link or something to what is this about? IMDB returns no relevant results...

"The Storm" is an epic miniseries event where the changeable forces of nature combine -- in the air, on land, in the seas -- as the world counts down its final, catastrophic hours. 

Golden Globe and Emmy Award nominee Treat Williams ("Everwood") and James Van Der Beek ("Dawson's Creek") star in this ultimate tale of man against nature. Also stars Teri Polo.

(from http://www.nbc.com/Movies_Specials_More/)
